name: Bundle Fish 2015
description:
Bubble Fish 2015 is a fun water balloon game. The game has a fresh and beautiful art style, contains different features fun bubble levels. Touch screen and drag your finger to set aim, release the finger to shot. When you get higher level, the frozen bubbles will appear and need to be thawed by a hot fish before being captured

This Fish game is among favorite children's games, as well as for the adults and alike with its’ classic gameplay and humorous and perfect combination of innovation.
Features:
* High-quality picture visual effects
* Bubble exciting props
* Realistic game physics and design inspiration
* Free bubble fish 2015 game
* The excellent and fantastic graphics
* The easy- to- use controls
* Addictive gameplay and soundtrack
* Fully customizable game menu
* Awesome user experience and GUI
This water balloon game is rated as one of the funniest playing bubble games, so do not hesitate to call on friends to the magical continent bubble fish 2015, bubbles together to experience the thrill of playing it!
Hope you enjoy playing this Santa Jump and we invite you to contact us if you have suggestions or feedback for us. Reach us at:
info@jupitech.co
